name: Luna Wave
bio: Luna Wave blends dreamy synth textures with warm vocal harmonies to create nostalgic indie pop soundscapes.

name: Atlas Echo
bio: Atlas Echo is known for kinetic live sets driven by atmospheric house rhythms and melodic bass lines.

name: Violet Lane
bio: Violet Lane delivers high-energy alt-rock anthems with introspective lyrics and punchy guitar hooks.

name: Sundial Soul
bio: Sundial Soul combines smooth R&B vocals and jazz-inspired arrangements in a modern, groove-forward style.
